protein.specific_function: Factor that represses transcription. It binds to the GC- rich sequences (5'-GCGGGGC-3') present in the epidermal growth factor receptor, beta-actin, and calcium-dependent protease promoters

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity

reference.reference_text: Kageyama R, Pastan I: Molecular cloning and characterization of a human DNA binding factor that represses transcription. Cell. 1989 Dec 1;59(5):815-25.
